alert.note: Alert for Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 8:45AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sequoyah, southern Adair and southeastern Cherokee Counties through 915 AM CST... At 844 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Lake Tenkiller State Park, moving northeast at 70 mph. Very heavy sleet and freezing rain is also occurring with this storm. Watch for slick spots that may rapidly develop. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Stilwell... Gore... Adair State Park... Bunch... Lake Tenkiller State Park... Maryetta... Box... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 290 and 292. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
